storyInfo: The lights go out in the Grand Knight Territory. A modern city is plunged into chaos, and the Armorless Union, the Infected, and the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz are all staging their own games.

attributes.content: Kawalerielki has entered a state of emergency, confirmed.
Correct signal code, confirmed. Correct squad identification code, confirmed.
Heed my orders.
Remove your disguises, and enter the city.
It'll still be some time until the power is completely restored.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The Rhodes Islanders have returned to their rooms, as advised. If you two would like to review...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Doctor, I want to go see them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everything happened so quickly, I'm sure there are many operators who still don't quite understand the situation. With all the anti-Infected protests going on, there's been a lot of pressure on everyone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I'll be counting on you again then, Amiya.;......;Are you sure you don't need my help?

attributes.content: Oh, it's fine, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know how busy you've been with business negotiations and social events recently. To be honest, I feel bad about it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You should get some rest while you still can.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahaha, you must already be worn out, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After all, you've been dealing with those businesspeople nonstop since yesterday. Of course you'd lose your voice, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But it's okay, with Hibiscus here, I'm sure we won't have any trouble.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I just want to go around and see how everyone's doing. I'll be right back.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's no need to worry, Amiya. I'll take real good care of the Doctor while you're gone.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Oh... Okay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: See you later then.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...{@nickname}Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: There've been some developments in the General Chamber of Commerce that may be disadvantageous to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Coupled with the ongoing power outage, I'm afraid that what happens next will be nothing less than an open conspiracy.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: For the time being... do not leave my side, whatever you do. Of course, it'd be even better if you decided to stay with me of your own accord.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Want to take a look around?

attributes.content: Heehee, I didn't expect you to be so forward. Caught me off guard.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Did something good happen?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Miss Gravel, what do you think of the K.G.C.C.?

attributes.content: Didn't you ask me something like this before? Or, do you just love the sound of my voice that much?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: They're parasites on Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The business class bands together, corrupting the knights and the city, just to chase their ambitions.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: The General Chamber of Commerce, as its name implies, is just a 'general' assemblage.
There is little that binds them beyond common interest, and they can be divided.
It feels like they're acting as a unit because they're fighting against the knights.

attributes.content: What did you do?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: There are roughly four types of executive directors in the K.G.C.C.

attributes.content: Heh... Care to tell me more?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: One is committed, so radical as to eliminate the knight class.
One is old-fashioned, a rock-solid faction that moves forward step by step.
Another has no principles, just a group of opportunists flocking to potential profit.

attributes.content: And the last one?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: The type that Rhodes Island is not ready to contact yet.
Rushing to contact them will only hurt us.

attributes.content: So what you're saying is there are cracks in the K.G.C.C.? And you... have already taken stock of them?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: I wouldn't call it 'cracks.';More like it was never possible for them to 'unite' in the first place.;Live for the sake of profit, die for the sake of profit.

attributes.content: But this is only your first time here, and you were only able to get to know a portion of the executives through your ties with a spokesman.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: How can you be so sure of yourself? The moment you place your trust in the wrong person, the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi will no longer bear the consequences.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Rhodes Island has never relied on the sacrifices of others to advance its goals.;As if I'd approach those banquets if I wasn't ready to sacrifice something.

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Do you still have time to waste?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: About the bounty placed on the Infected, once the interference from the Great Separation has passed, you'll have no escape route.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Ah, by the way, the reason it's called the 'Great Separation' is because after power from the core is lost, each plate will experience a short period of drift.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Right now, the connections to the plates around the K.G.C.C. have broken off, and you won't be able to escape.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Ugh... Goddammit...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: This doesn't seem like an enemy we can take head-on.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I'm glad you finally understand what you should've always understood. So let me ask again, will you hand me the goods? I wouldn't mind letting you go.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Heh, when is the Armorless Union a charity?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I guess it was a matter of mindset. After a long, long struggle... I finally saw the light.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: From the ruins of Bolívar, to the prairies of Kazimierz, and finally here.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: No normal person finds joy in the slaughter of others. Only idiotic pampered princelings derive any pleasure from seeing people bleed.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Now, you can save me, Infected, and I can help you dismantle the Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Sorry, but even if that's true, I'm not about to give you this.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: We're sick and tired of being manipulated.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ashley!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Got it! Have a taste of this!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough* *cough*... What's the meaning of this...?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Ashley, run!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I know!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Running into the substructure? One wrong step, and you'll be mincemeat in the engine.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: There's nowhere for you to run––
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hngh.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Ashley! Watch out!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: A cyan arrow pierces Flametail Knight's armor.
Sona tries to block it, but the massive force of the impact sends her petite body flying.
Struggling in midair, she is launched into the gap between the city's plates.
Sona––!!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (Off the mark. Something blurred my vision for a second there...)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (An illusion caused by my fatigue...? No, something got in my way after all.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You've lost your mind.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Tisk tisk, firing from such close range. Are you trying to get us both killed?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You... How dare you... do that to Sona!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I'll admit, it was careless of me.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I haven't had a chance to check if the chip is still intact. That's bad news, I wouldn't want that responsibility sitting on my shoulders.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Shut up, bastard!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (What to do, what to do. Hurry and kill Ashlock, and look for a way to go check the corpse?)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (No, this is far too dangerous. The power is about to come back on, and I wouldn't want to be caught between those plates.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I'll have you pay in blood––!!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: So straightforward, so predictable. You've been all too easy to read since you lost your ability to think––
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Oh really?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hrmph. Was I the careless one?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: She's gone?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Was she only pretending to be enraged...?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Become a knight for the Infected.
Fight to the bitter end for the Infected.
That is my honor.
There is no greater honor... than to die for a glorious cause.
I would've liked to go out in a blaze of glory, but... what's going on now?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Roy is still around here somewhere. He'll discover my Arts sooner or later, so we mustn't tarry here.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Contact your companion and have her escape. I'll do what I can for her.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Hey, Ashley, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Don't let him know, and look for a chance to escape. I slipped the chip into your pocket when I blocked that arrow for you. Go ahead and double-check.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No need to reply. See you on the way back.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You broke my fall? But how?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Arts can be applied in many different ways. After extensive studying, almost all Leithanians are able to use basic Arts, regardless of the nature of these Arts.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You're the Candle Knight, right?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Why would a great knight like you... save an Infected like me?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: There's someone who wants to see you.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I can't tell you yet.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Oh... You should already know that we're pretty busy right now, paralyzing the city, attacking the K.G.C.C... I don't have time for a picnic, you know?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's understandable that you would distrust me.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: No, I believe you.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You can tell what someone's thinking, just gotta look into their eyes.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Of course, this trick doesn't work a hundred percent of the time, but this is desperate times, right?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ugh... What the hell is going on? The roads are blocked, and I can't get a taxi. Do I not get to go home tonight either?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: What an idiot... 'finish in one day' my ass... That report should've been done yesterday...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Wh—What... what's happening?!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Out of my way, or I'm shooting through all of you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Eep! P-P-Please don't, I'm moving––
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Stop moving around, lad. You wouldn't want that noggin of yours finding a new home, eh?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: B-But she told me to move––
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Would you really trust someone who'd take your head off on a whim?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Toland, have you no shame hiding behind a civilian?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Aaaaagh—!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Good point. I'll count to three?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: P-P-P-please, I'm begging you, l-leave me alone!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: One.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Nooooooo––!!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Two.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Three!
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: They're both insane! They're both insane––!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Where does this road lead–– Wait, over there, that's––
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Mr. Knight! Mr. Knight!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I'm an employee of the Rose Paper Union! Please help me! You know who I am, right? I'll recommend you to the editorial department! There are two criminals over––
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Eek...!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Do you ever run out of arrows?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Grrr... This is the first time my prey's eluded me for several minutes... Not half bad, Toland Cash.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Is it your goal to stall me here?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Haha... What about you? Are you here to play with me?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: No, there's a handsome bounty on your head, and we're always in need of money.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Oh? Do you have a sickly little brother back home? Or maybe an elderly father who needs your support?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: This job brings more wealth than you can imagine, bounty hunter.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: We know the rules of this society better than you, better than any of the knights.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: We simply chose to take a little detour, and after tonight's hunt, we'll usher in a new beginning.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: But right now, it seems there's another idiot hellbent on messing things up.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: To think you could still see such a splend'rous night sky in this death-choked city.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: This is the kind of night I've always known. Let this manmade malediction be left behind... and shed every last drop of this city's blood! Bravo, ye faceless rebels!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: What a strange knight. The private duels must not be paying well.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Clown.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Is everyone okay?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret, I just found the spare battery... Alright, see, now the light's on, yeah? Doesn't feel like it'll last long though.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Looks like everyone's okay. V and Kowal went to check on the situation. They'll be back later.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Where's Młynar?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: He stayed home. Said it would be difficult to get away from work, and wanted some time alone.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What about Shining and Nightingale?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: They were worried that the Armorless Union might have their sights on the Doctor, and rushed back to the Infected shelter.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Don't worry. They're both very dependable.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: No, it's just that... I still don't know anything about the things going on around you.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Sorry, but I deliberately kept you out of the loop. I can't afford to get Doctor and the others tangled up with my personal affairs.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But maybe one day, you'll get to know each other. Maybe one day, Maria, you'll also find yourself aboard that ship.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Their dazzling idealism will eventually guide everyone forward. Even if they hold vastly different beliefs and walk different paths, nothing can shake the conviction in their hearts.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That reminds me of...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The knights from the stories.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm back!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It's pitch black... The flashlight merchant next door should've restocked by now, right?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Oh, it's Margaret.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: It's an absolute mess outside right now. I say we behave ourselves, stay indoors, and wait for the power to come back.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Just sit here doing nothing? Wasn't there supposed to be a match today?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: It was supposed to be the day the eight strongest knights were decided.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Have you seen the latest news of the Blood Knight?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: More or less... He's the undefeated king this season, from the qualifiers to the Major... But beyond that...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: He's also the hero of the Infected.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Where are we going? I'm not complaining, but I really don't exactly have a lot of free time on my hands.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: ...the Wall of Champions exhibit hall?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: This is a secret meeting, so try to keep your voice down.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: So which knight wanted to meet me?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Knight...? Well, you're not technically wrong. She was indeed a respectable knight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Haha, but don't be nervous... She's just a regular old lady now.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Head on in.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You're not coming?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Let's just say... she's one of the few people in Kazimierz who scares me even a bit.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Wow... Even the Candle Knight, bearer of the Candle Sword, is afraid of someone? What chance do I have then?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It probably won't be the same for you.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: After all, she counts as my half adoptive mother, at least in name.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: (It's the same emergency power supply as the K.G.C.C... Was this place not affected by the outage either?)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (Both the knights... and the General Chamber...)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (...are still shining through the darkness.)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The lights flicker.
And so does Sona's train of thought.
The knights, and the money, were able to avoid the deep night.
Who drowns in the darkness?
Flametail Knight... Sona.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Come here and let me have a closer look at you.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: You! You're...!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Now, now. I didn't come here today to talk business.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: I heard... the Infected knights made some kind of deal with the knights of the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Between the Knights Association and Demian, a member of the Adeptus.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: In order for the Infected to survive in the Grand Knight Territory, they agreed to participate in this operation with his cooperation.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: The Great Kawalerielki Separation... the Adeptus gave in, letting it happen once more.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Look at this wall... These knights were supposed to become real heroes. Not... this, symbols for spectators to gawk at.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Does this sight not fill you with great sorrow?
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: It certainly does, ma'am.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But I feel more sorrow for... the Infected who still need equal treatment, and for those totally lost to entertainment and materialism.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I cry... for each and every person struggling to make it to the next sunrise here in Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Truly a spectacular inaugural speech, young squirrel.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Can the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi really give us a normal life?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Paperwork, procedures, any documentation the National Council needs. Of course, the Adeptus will handle it all for you. That is what Demian promised you.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: But what about the Originium crystals on your body?
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: I admire Pinus Sylvestris, but the problems you must overcome... are not so well-defined.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: In time, Demian will reach out to you. He may not be the sharpest tool in the shed, but trust him. He has his ways.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Good. My knightclub will be here shortly, so hurry and find your companions.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Also, tell Viviana to come and have a meal with me when she's not busy.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: .........Ma'am, what does it mean to be a knight?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The answer to the question is different for everyone, child.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: You wouldn't be interested in mine anyway. Us old folks, we've seen too much.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Go, little squirrel, go.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: See if the sunrise in Kazimierz still blazes ever-bright.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: ...I lost her.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Would it be more efficient to post a surround and suppress mission later?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I'm here. What's the matter?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What...? How many?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Exceptional swordsmanship.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Ahh, I'd prefer not to waste any more time here with you, old friend.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Goddamned maniac...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I'd best get out of here after I kill Toland.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I'm in a game of hide-and-seek with the 'Guildmaster' and a Nightzmora. Not the best time to chat.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: No... I'll head there now.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Let's wrap up our little game, Toland.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You're running?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Same goes for you, Nightzmora.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: What? You're a Nightzmora?!
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Let's call it here for now.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You came to Kawalerielki to find your people and a good fight, right?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Don't speak so lightly of our tradition of glory, Kazimierzian. You don't have that right.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: No, I'm just offering you a warning, Nightzmora, out of the kindness of my heart.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Don't waste your energy on us.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I can agree with that.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Boastful nonsense.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Hmph. See you never, dumbass.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Is the traffic still stuck? I heard the power's already come back in some places.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Shouldn't the Knights Association compensate us for our terrible losses?!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Knight

attributes.content: Yeah! The government should pay us back our travel expenses!
attributes.name: A Tourist

attributes.content: Ugh... I hope the meat in the fridge didn't go bad.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You know, we can take out any single one of their people, alone.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Two of them, we'll need to bring help.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Three of them, and it's going to be one hell of a rough battle.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If there's three or more of them... that could take a full tactical squad, and the Armorless Union can't afford those losses.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If there's more of them than you can count on your fingers, calling in the entire Armorless Union might not even be enough to put them down.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I know, I've seen them before. Your concern is better placed elsewhere.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: So, how many did the scouts see?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Roughly forty.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Well shit... Right at this juncture?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Yes. I've already notified the Board of Directors.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Do they intend to capture the Kawalerielki Alliance?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Impossible!
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: No, this can't be! Where are the military consultants? Where are the people monitoring the knights?!
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Those campaign knights dispatched by the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi... Where were they in the last report?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Five hundred and seventy-three kilometers.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: There's no way a normal squad of campaign knights would be able to march that fast... It's impossible...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Did the Adeptus mobilize another branch behind the General Chamber's back? No, that can't be...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The Silverlance fast-response squad... What's their fastest record?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Could they have disguised their military identification code? And even their armor and lances?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Hm? It's a little brighter now, isn't it?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Knight

attributes.content: Look over there! That little halo of light on the other side of the road! The power must've come back over there!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: But... the lights still won't turn on...
attributes.name: A Tourist

attributes.content: That looks a lot more like... moonlight?
attributes.name: A Tourist

attributes.content: Moonlight.
The prosperity afforded by the advent of the energized glass tubes gradually led to modern man forgetting the appearance of the primordial moonlight.
This city, engulfed in a brief moment of darkness––
––is illuminated by a silver glow.
Are..... are those knights over there?
attributes.name: An Onlooker

attributes.content: Th-The campaign knights?! Here?!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Knight

attributes.content: The knights pass through the crowd.
Through the city known as the City of Knights.
Through the city that does not recognize them.
Through the city that they do not recognize.
They came from a faraway fortress close to the border.
Their bodies are stained with the clear and tangible scent of the soil.
A scent mixed with flesh, blood, bones, and the lives of countless heroes buried on battlefields past.
Inform all members of the Armorless Union to stop whatever they're doing this instant, no matter what it is.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Do not make any moves unless you want trouble. Do not act rashly.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Monique?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That one... over there...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Nostalgic?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...I certainly am.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I miss... that time when I stupidly thought this place wasn't so bad. Those were good times. Exciting times.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: If you had really given up, then you wouldn't still be here, would you?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Młynar, take a good look all around you. The city sleeps, and nobody has ever even woken up.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But what about you?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Reporting! A portion of the communications lines are back––!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ––Connect me to the associate justice of the National Council.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Yessir.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Your honor?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You already know what I'm about to say. This band of campaign knights trespassed into the Grand Knight Territory without authorization, violating the Second Act––
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Former Associate Justice Duke of the National Council, has been detained on suspicion of bribery, smuggling, murder, and dereliction of duty.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I would advise you to choose your words calmly and carefully, Spokesman.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: The Grand Knight Territory is in a state of emergency due to a blackout, and the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has the authority to send troops into the city during a state of emergency.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Do you have any further questions?
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: None. I apologize for the intrusion, sir.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Communications are more or less restored, Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Look how busy they are over there... What do you think a phone is?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Huh? Obviously a communication tool...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: No. The phone is the spindle and plough of modern society, the pathway that weaves the fabric of life as we currently know it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It is a symbol of greatness, Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: McKee's words fail him.
Suddenly, he senses an aura of sorts from Malkiewicz.
Over the last few months, a business venture failed spectacularly, amounting to nothing. Those who have been whipped almost naturally give off a certain kind of aura.
He has seen this kind of aura in many people before.
Most of them were chewed up and mangled by the changing times or by the competition. As for the few who survived––
––nearly all of them turned out the same.
